opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Siegel v. Arlington County Department of Community Planning Housing and Development

opinion:
541 U.S. 970

SIEGEL
v.
ARLINGTON COUNTY DEPARTMENT OF COMMUNITY PLANNING HOUSING AND DEVELOPMENT ET AL.

No. 03-8716.

Supreme Court of United States.

April 5, 2004.

1

C. A. 4th Cir. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and certiorari dismissed. See this Court's Rule 39.8. Reported below: 79 Fed. Appx. 571.
